item.description:
Good Evening Coffee Talkers,

Between 2:00 to 2:30 at Gillette Castle.

I might meet some guests and members at
Milford Barnes & Noble at 12:30.

I might meet some guest and members at
1:00 or so at

New Haven TA Travel Center
I-95 Exit 56
Branford , CT 06405
203-481-0301

http://www.aitaonline...

www.aitaonline.com/TS/CT.html

We can meet in front of the TA Travel Center, but there is also a Starbucks there
Or you can buy coffee at the TA Travel Center.

This depends on I 95 Traffic from Milford to Branford.

Are there any other locations that some of you
Need to meet to car pool?

Gillette Castle State Park

http://www.ct.gov/dep...

www.ct.gov/dep/cwp/view.asp?A=2716&Q=325204

Getting there...

1)
From I 91 South: Take Exit 22S & follow Route 9 South.
Take Exit 7, follow 82 East, cross the Connecticut River and
Follow signs for Gillette Castle.

From I 95 North: Take Exit 69 & follow Route 9 North to Exit 6 or 7.
To take the Chester-Hadlyme Ferry across the Conn. River,
Get off at Exit 6 & follow Route 148 & Gillette Castle signs.
The ferry operates daily from spring to fall.

2)
Gillette Castle is located at 67 River Road in East Haddam, Connecticut.
From Route 9 North or South,
take Exit 7 for Route 82. Follow Route 82 East through Goodspeed Landing,
and watch for signs directing you to the park.

Hours and Admission... Gillette Castle State Park is open from
8 a.m. until sunset year-round.
Self-guided castle tours are offered continuously from
10 a.m. until 4:30 p.m. daily from
Memorial Day weekend until Columbus Day.

While admission to the grounds is free, there is a charge of $5 for adults,
$3 for children ages 6 to 17 to tour the castle.
Children 5 and under are admitted free.
Call ahead to make special arrangements if you are bringing a group.

A)
http://en.wikipedia.o...

en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gillette_Castle_State_Park

B)
http://www.friendsofg...

www.friendsofgillettecastle.org/

C)

http://www.ctriverval...

www.ctrivervalley.com/4-Connecticut-CT-in-of/Major-attractions-in-CT/gillette_castle_state_park/index.html

D)

http://hartford.about...

hartford.about.com/cs/daytrips/a/aagcastle.htm

E)

http://www.newengland...

www.newenglandsite.com/ct-gillettecastle.shtml

Mike B

Organizer
item.how_to_find_us: Some of us will meet at car pool locations or in front of the Castle.
item.why: Who wants to go on a Summer Day trip to a Conn. Castle.
item.name: Coffee Talks has a Cup at Gillette Castle on 7/13
